ploys.name: MARTIAL PROTOCOL
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subTexts: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE VANGUARD operative that is within 2' of an objective marker or within 6' of your opponent's drop zone makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER operative that has not moved during the Turning Point makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

ploys.name: ACCELERANT AGENTS
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE RUSTSTALKER operative is activated:
subTexts: It can perform a free Fight action during that activation.
It can perform two Fight actions during that activation.

ploys.name: NEUROSTATIC INTERFERENCE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, while an enemy operative is within 6' of a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operative, each time that enemy operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your opponent cannot re-roll their attack dice.

ploys.name: CALCULATED APPROACH
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative that is more than 6' from enemy operatives, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical saves, you can select one of your failed saves to be retained as a successful normal save.

ploys.name: PURSUERS
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy in the Scouting step of the mission sequence, when you resolve your scouting option.
subTexts: If you selected the Recon option, you can also perform a free Dash action with up to two friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER operatives that are wholly within your drop zone.
If you selected the Infiltrate option, during the first Turning Point, you can also change the order of up to two ready friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER operatives when each of them are activated.

ploys.name: COMMAND OVERRIDE
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative is activated. Select one Doctrina Imperative that is not active for your kill team. Until the end of the Turning Point, that Imperative is treated as being active for that operative instead of the current active Imperative.

ploys.name: CONCEALED POSITION
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy in the Set Up Operatives step of the mission sequence. Select one friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operative. That operative can be set up with a Conceal order anywhere in the killzone that is within 1' of Heavy terrain and more than 6' from enemy operatives and the enemy drop zone. That operative cannot have its order changed during the first Turning Point as a result of the Infiltrate option in the Scouting step. You can only use this Tactical Ploy once.

ploys.name: MOTIVE FORCE VITALITY
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a ready friendly HUNTER CLADE operative is activated. That operative regains D3 lost wounds.

equipments.name: UPLINKED VID-FEED
equipments.description: RANGER or VANGUARD operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Uplinked Vid-Feed
ability.description: Each time this operative performs an Overwatch action, for that action's shooting attack, do not worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of its ranged weapons as a result of performing an Overwatch action.

equipments.name: SERVO-SKULL
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Servo-skull
ability.description: This operative can perform mission actions for one less AP (to a minimum of 0AP).

equipments.name: MECHADENDRITES
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Mechadendrite
ability.description: Once per Turning Point, during this operative's activation, it can perform the Pick Up action for one less AP (to a minimum of 0AP).

equipments.name: CENSE BEARER
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Cense Bearer
ability.description: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative within 3' of this operative is activated, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that friendly operative's Movement characteristic for that activation (excluding the modifier from the Bulwark Imperative).

equipments.name: COMMAND UPLINK
equipments.description: DIKTAT operative only. The operative can perform the following action during the battle:

uniqueAction.name: COMMAND UPLINK
uniqueAction.description: Add 1CP to your pool. This operative cannot perform this action while within 6' of an enemy operative.

equipments.name: ENRICHED ROUNDS
equipments.description: Select one radium carbine or master-crafted radium pistol the operative is equipped with. Add 1 to that weapon's Normal Damage characteristic for the battle.

equipments.name: OPTIMISED GAIT
equipments.description: RUSTSTALKER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Optimised Gait
ability.description: Each time this operative is activated, it can ignore the first distance of 2' it travels for a climb, drop or traverse during that activation.

equipments.name: REFRACTOR FIELD
equipments.description: LEADER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Refractor Field
ability.description: This operative has a 4+ invulnerable save.

tacOps.name: RELENTLESS PURSUIT
tacOps.description: You can reveal this Tac Op in the Target Reveal step of any Turning Point.
tacOps.firstCondition: At the end of any Turning Point, if there are no enemy operatives in the killzone more than 6' from friendly operatives, you score 1VP.
tacOps.secondCondition: If you achieve the first condition in any subsequent Turning Points, you score 1VP.

tacOps.name: CALCULATED ERADICATION
tacOps.description: Reveal this Tac Op when a Doctrina Imperative first becomes active for your kill team.
tacOps.firstCondition: At the end of any Turning Point, if an Imperative is active for your kill team, and the total wounds lost by enemy operatives during that Turning Point is greater than that lost by friendly operatives, you score 1VP.
tacOps.secondCondition: At the end of any Turning Point, if a different Imperative is active for your kill team, and the total wounds lost by enemy operatives during that Turning Point is greater than that lost by friendly operatives, you score 1VP.

ability.name: Designer's Note
ability.description: After revealing this Tac Op, we recommend keeping a tally of wounds lost by each kill team during each Turning Point.

tacOps.name: ASSASSINATION ORDER
tacOps.description: Reveal this Tac Op in the Target Reveal step of the first Turning Point. Your opponent selects one of their operatives.
tacOps.firstCondition: If that enemy operative is incapacitated before the fourth Turning Point, you score 1VP.
tacOps.secondCondition: If the first condition is achieved by a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative within 3' of that enemy operative, you score 1VP.

abilityOfKillTeam.name: DOCTRINA IMPERATIVES
description: In the Strategy phase of the first Turning Point, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, you must select one Doctrina Imperative below to become active for your kill team instead. That Imperative is active until the end of the battle, or until you change it to a different Imperative, whichever comes first.

In the Strategy phase of a subsequent Turning Point, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, you can select one different Imperative below to become active for your kill team instead That Imperative is active until the end of the battle (you cannot change your active Imperative again).
Each Imperative has an Optimisation and a Deprecation effect. Both are in effect while that Imperative is active for your kill team.

imperatives.name: Protector Imperative
imperatives.optimisation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, before any other re-rolls, if you rolled two or more failed hits, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
imperatives.deprecation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, before any other re-rolls, you must re-roll one of your critical hits (if any).

imperatives.name: Conqueror Imperative
imperatives.optimisation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.
imperatives.deprecation: Each time a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, before any other re-rolls, you must re-roll one of your critical hits (if any).

imperatives.name: Bulwark Imperative
imperatives.optimisation: Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, before any other rules take effect, if you rolled two or more failed saves, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.
imperatives.deprecation: Subtract 2' from the Movement characteristic of friendly HUNTER CLADE operatives.

imperatives.name: Aggressor Imperative
imperatives.optimisation: Add 1' to the Movement characteristic of friendly HUNTER CLADE operatives.
imperatives.deprecation: Each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly HUNTER CLADE operative, defence dice cannot be automatically retained as a result of Cover (they must be rolled instead).

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Grunts of the Imperial Guard, Guardsmen are recruited, trained and equipped in their millions to doggedly fight wherever the Imperium needs them. They carry varying patterns of the dependable lasgun, along with any extra kit they manage to acquire.

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN (COMMS)
availableDataslates.description: Equipped with heavy vox-casters, comms specialists keep the team tethered to their regiment's rigid hierarchy of command, enabling them to relay their commanders' orders while reporting back on enemy troop movements or spotting for artillery.

abilities.name: Relay Orders
abilities.description: Once in each Turning Point, when this operative is issued a Guardsman Order, it can relay it. If an order is relayed, subtract 1 from this operative's APL and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives in the killzone are issued that order.

uniqueActions.name: Signal
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly GUARDSMAN operative within 6' of and Visible to this operative. Add 1 to the friendly operative's APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: These Guardsmen are often the team's sharpshooters, issued with additional training for the heavier weaponry they carry, and supporting their fellow soldiers with devastating anti-armour hrepower, incinerating blazes and pinpoint sniper fire.

specialRules.name: Heavy
specialRules.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRules.name: Silent
specialRules.description: While an operative has a Conceal order, it can perform Shoot actions if this is the ranged weapon (or weapon profile) that is selected for the shooting attack(s).

availableDataslates.name: GUARDSMAN SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Guardsman Sergeants coordinate their team with grizzled experience and tactical nous, enforcing their superiors' orders to ensure the success of the mission.

specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

abilities.name: Guardsman Orders
abilities.description: Each time you use one of the Strategic Ploys, it takes effect as a Guardsman Order. All friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives, and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives within  of and Visible to a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD LEADER operative, are issued that Guardsman Order.

specialRules.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Hot
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, for each attack dice result of 1 that is discarded, that operative suffers three mortal wounds.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTUS SCION (TROOPER)
availableDataslates.description: Tempestus Scions are an elite force within the Astra Militarum, equipped with specialist wargear to conduct dangerous missions. They typically bear high-powered hot-shot lasguns and wear dense carapace armour that provides extra protection in deadly kill zones.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTUS SCION (COMMS)
availableDataslates.description: Bearing advanced vox-casters, these Scions provide updated tactical information, keeping their team in contact with regimental headquarters. Some are also trained in counter-intelligence and the interception of signals, allowing their team to outmanoeuvre the foe.

uniqueActions.name: Signal
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operative in the killzone. Add 1 to its APL. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives. This operative can perform this action more than once during its activation.

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTUS SCION (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: Tempestus Scions have access to more specialist weapons than most infantry regiments. Those issued with them act as fire support for the rest of their team, blasting open pathways and eliminating threats that would jeopardise the success of the mission.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng . All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Torrent 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent .

specialRules.name: Blast 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Fusillade
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

criticalHitSpecialRules.name: P1
criticalHitSpecialRules.description: Piercing. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, the weapon gains the APx special rule for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's P, e.g. P1.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'

availableDataslates.name: TEMPESTOR
availableDataslates.description: Skilled tacticians and leaders, Tempestors design the kill zone insertions that the Scions are justifiably famed for. They are also granted prestige weapons normally restricted to high-ranking officers, making them devastatingly effective fighters in their own right.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

abilities.name: Guardsman Orders
abilities.description: Each time you use one of the Strategic Ploys, it takes effect as a Guardsman Order. All friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives, and all friendly GUARDSMAN operatives within  of and Visible to a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD LEADER operative, are issued that Guardsman Order.

abilities.name: Accomplished Leader
abilities.description: In each of your Strategy phases, if this operative is in the killzone, you can use one Strategic Ploy without spending any Command Points.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'

specialRules.name: Brutal
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, your opponent can only parry with critical hits.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

ploys.name: TAKE AIM!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

ploys.name: TAKE COVER!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if it is in Cover, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice results of 1.

ploys.name: FIX BAYONETS!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order fights in combat, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice results of 1.

ploys.name: MOVE! MOVE! MOVE!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly operative that was issued this Guardsman Order is activated, until the end of that activation, add 1' to its Movement characteristic.

ploys.name: SPECIAL FORCES
ploys.description: Select the Pick up action or one mission action friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operatives can perform. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly TEMPESTUS SCION operative is activated, it can perform that action for one less AP (to a minimum of 0AP).

ploys.name: BRING IT DOWN!
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy after a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative makes a shooting attack. Until the end of the Turning Point, each time another friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative makes a shooting attack against the target of that shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that subsequent shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

equipments.name: FRAG GRENADE
equipments.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Limited
specialRules.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRules.name: Blast 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Indirect
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

equipments.name: KRAK GRENADE
equipments.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action:

equipments.name: MEDIKIT
equipments.description: The operative gains the MEDIC keyword until the start of the next battle and can perform the following action during the battle:

uniqueAction.name: MEDIKIT
uniqueAction.description: Select one friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative within 1' of and Visible to this operative. That operative regains 2D3 lost wounds. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of enemy operatives.

equipments.name: CARAPACE ARMOUR
equipments.description: GUARDSMAN operative only. The operative has a 4+ Save characteristic for the battle.

equipments.name: SCION BLADE
equipments.description: TEMPESTUS SCION operative only. The operative is equipped with the following melee weapon for the battle:

equipments.name: REGIMENTAL STANDARD
equipments.description: The operative can perform the following action during the battle:
equipments.additionalText: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Regimental Standard
ability.description: When determining control of an objective marker, treat this operative's APL as being 1 higher. Note that this is not a modifier. In narrative play, this is cumulative with the Focused Battle Honour.

uniqueAction.name: PLANT THE STANDARD
uniqueAction.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, while this operative is Visible to and within 3' of a friendly IMPERIAL GUARD operative with the same <REGIMENT> or <TEMPESTUS REGIMENT> keyword as this operative, that friendly operative is inspired by the regimental standard. While an operative is inspired by the regimental standard, each time a shooting attack is made against it, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

availableDataslates.name: TROOPER VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Astra Militarum Veterans have a great deal of combat experience, gained over experiencing harsh fighting for months or even years. Armed with lasguns and bayonets, they have faced down terrible danger time and time again.

availableDataslates.name: SERGEANT VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Veteran Sergeants command squads of Veterans in battle. Calm under pressure and unphased by the horrors of war, they are solid combat leaders who will fight tooth and nail to achieve victory as well as see their comrades survive to fight another day.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

abilities.name: Guardsman Orders
abilities.description: Once in each Strategy phase, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy, if this operative is in the killzone, it can issue a Guardsmen Order. If it does, all friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operatives within 6' of and Visible to it are issued a Guardsmen Order.Each time a friendly operative issues a Guardsmen Order, select one Guardsmen Order below to take effect until the end of the Turning Point. If more than one Guardsmen Order could be issued by your kill team during the Turning Point, e.g. the Inspirational Leadership Tactical Ploy, they must be different Guardsmen Orders.

specialRules.name: Balanced
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

availableDataslates.name: SNIPER VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Expert marksmen, their skills honed in the harsh conditions of numerous battlefields, Sniper Veterans are sharpshooters who specialise in cutting down key enemy troops at extreme ranges - all unseen by the foe.

criticalHitSpecialRules.name: MW3
criticalHitSpecialRules.description: Mortal wounds. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the roll attack dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit retained, inflict x mortal wounds on the target, x is the number after the weapon's MW, e.g. MW3.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Each time this operative is activated, so long as it does not perform a Normal Move, Charge or Fall Back action during that activation, its long-las gains the Silent special rule for that activation.

criticalHitSpecialRules.name: MW3

availableDataslates.name: GUNNER VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: With experience and skills in wielding a whole host of specialist weapons, Gunner Veterans are called whether a Sergeant Veteran needs a xenos nest burned to nothing, a bunker reduced to melted sludge or to bring down heavy enemy infantry that lasguns are insufficient for.

availableDataslates.name: CONFIDANT VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Even the best Sergeant Veterans need to call on solid tactical advice - and their confidants are experts. Experienced troops and capable leaders themselves, they can be trusted to carry out the sergeant's orders in the field as well as contribute to the formulation of a solid battle plan.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

abilities.name: Second in Command
abilities.description: If a friendly SERGEANT VETERAN operative is incapacitated and removed from the killzone, you can nominate this operative for command. If you do, until the end of the battle, it gains the LEADER keyword and the Guardsmen Orders ability.

abilities.name: Directive
abilities.description: Each time this operative is activated, if it has not been nominated for command, you can select one ready friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative within 6' of and Visible to it. After this operative's activation ends, activate that operative, and treat its Group Activation characteristic as 1 for that activation.

specialRules.name: Balanced
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Balanced
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

availableDataslates.name: DEMOLITION VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Whether blowing up ammo dumps or cracking open defences, many kill teams need explosives experts. Demolition Veterans are such troops. Naturally daring, they often have to put themselves in harm's way to plant their remote mines at the optimum point to blow their target into smithereens.

uniqueActions.name: Plant Mine
uniqueActions.description: Place a Mine token within 1' of this operative, then perform a free Dash action with this operative. This operative cannot perform this action if it is within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, or if this operative's Mine token is in the killzone. If this operative is incapacitated and removed from the killzone, remove its Mine token.

specialRules.name: AP1
specialRules.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRules.name: Detonate
specialRules.description: Each time this operative makes a Shoot action using its remote mine, make a shooting attack against each operative within 3' of the centre of its Mine token with that weapon. When making those shooting attacks, each operative (friendly and enemy) within 3' is a valid target, but when determining if it is in Cover, treat this operative's Mine token as the active operative. Then remove this operative's Mine token. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action, or if its Mine token is not in the killzone.

specialRules.name: Silent
specialRules.description: While an operative has a Conceal order, it can perform Shoot actions if this is the ranged weapon (or weapon profile) that is selected for the shooting attack(s).

availableDataslates.name: ZEALOT VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Zealot Veterans are deeply spiritual warriors, often claiming their survival through the horrifying battlefields they've experienced is only thanks to the direct intervention of the Emperor himself.

abilities.name: The Emperor Protects
abilities.description: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice.

uniqueActions.name: Uplifting Primer
uniqueActions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, while a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative is within 3' of this operative, that friendly operative is uplifted. While an operative is uplifted, each time it fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can select one of your results of 5+ to be retained as a critical hit.

availableDataslates.name: MEDIC VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: The efforts of the Medic Veteran is all that stands between life and miserable death for the troops of his squad. Equipped with little more than basic medical equipment, they strive to keep their comrades alive in the most hazardous conditions.

abilities.name: Medic!
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, the first time another friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative would be incapacitated while Visible to and within 3' of this operative and not within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, if this operative is not within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, this operative can revive it. That operative is not incapacitated, has 1 wound remaining, and if it was a shooting attack, any remaining attack dice are discarded. That other friendly operative can then perform a free Dash action, but must finish that move within 1' of this operative. Subtract 1 from both operatives' APL.

uniqueActions.name: Medikit
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative within 1' of and Visible to this operative. That operative regains 2D3 lost wounds. An operative cannot be selected for this if it was revived using the Medic! ability during the same Turning Point. This operative cannot perform this action if it is within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

availableDataslates.name: COMMS VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Comms Veterans are consummate professionals, accompanying their leaders wherever required whilst carrying heavy equipment, all to receive and transmit communications that are vital for their comrades and superiors to understand the inevitable confusion of battle.

abilities.name: Relay Orders
abilities.description: Once in each Turning Point, when this operative is issued a Guardsman Order, it can relay it If an order is relayed, subtract 1 from this operative's APL and all friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operatives in the Killzone are issued that order.

uniqueActions.name: Signal
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative within 6' of and Visible to this operative. Add 1 to its APL. This operative cannot perform this action if it is within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

availableDataslates.name: BRUISER VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: For some, war and fighting just agrees with them. Bruiser Veterans are such people. They look the galaxy's endless malevolent threats in the eye with a trench club in their hand, ready to bludgeon anything and everything to death.

abilities.name: Bruiser
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, when this operative fights in combat, in the resolve successful hits step of that combat, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one normal hit.

criticalHitSpecialRules.name: Stun
criticalHitSpecialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

availableDataslates.name: HARDENED VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: Some Veterans are resilient above and beyond even their peers. These troops are steel in body as well as in mind, with bionics in the place of body parts lost in battle. Despite the horrific wounds they have suffered, they fight on still, unbowed.

abilities.name: Hardened by War
abilities.description: Each time this operative would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost. You can ignore any or all modifiers to this operative's APL.

availableDataslates.name: SPOTTER VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: To direct battle-winning heavy fire, forward observers form a part of kill teams. These Spotter Veterans possess great focus, accurately guiding salvoes of mortar fire from safe lines even when under immense pressure. With this they can stymie enemy attacks or pin them down in their defences.

uniqueActions.name: Spotter
uniqueActions.description: Select one enemy operative Visible to this operative, then select one other ready friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative with a Group Activation characteristic of 1 within 2' of and Visible to this operative. After this activation ends, you can activate that other friendly operative, and during its next activation, it treats that enemy operative as if it has an Engage order. This operative cannot perform this action if it is within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

specialRules.name: Barrage
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, for that shooting attack, the automatic retention of defence dice as a result of cover is determined differently. Instead, if any part of the operative's base is hidden by a terrain feature from directly above, the defender can retain defence dice as if they were in cover.

specialRules.name: Unwieldy
specialRules.description: An operative can only make a shooting attack with this weapon if an extra AP is subtracted to perform a Shoot action. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Blast 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Silent
specialRules.description: While an operative has a Conceal order, it can perform Shoot actions if this is the ranged weapon (or weapon profile) that is selected for the shooting attack(s).

ploys.name: OVERCHARGE LASGUNS
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, change the profile of lasguns that friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operatives are equipped with to the following:

specialRules.name: AP1
specialRules.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRules.name: Hot
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, for each attack dice result of 1 that is discarded, that operative suffers three mortal wounds.

ploys.name: TAKE COVER!
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a shooting attack is made against a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative, if it is in Cover, improve its Save characteristic by 1 for that shooting attack.

ploys.name: INTO THE BREACH
ploys.description: Each friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative within your drop zone can perform a free Dash action, but must finish that move closer to the enemy's drop zone.

ploys.name: CLEAR THE LINE
ploys.description: UUntil the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative fights in combat, before rolling your attack dice for that combat, you can retain one as a successful normal hit without rolling it.

ploys.name: INSPIRATIONAL LEADERSHIP
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy during a VETERAN GUARDSMAN LEADER operative's activation. That operative issues a Guardsmen Order to all friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operatives within 6' of and Visible to it.

ploys.name: IN DEATH, ATONEMENT
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a ready friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative is incapacitated. That operative is not removed from the killzone until the end of your next activation or the end of the battle (whichever comes first) and does not count as being injured.

ploys.name: COMBINED ARMS
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy after rolling your attack dice for a shooting attack made by a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative. If the target of that attack is an enemy operative that was targeted by another friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative with a shooting attack during that Turning Point, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice for that shooting attack.

equipments.name: HOT-SHOT CAPACITOR PACK
equipments.description: Modify the operative's ranged weapons for the battle as follows:
subTexts: Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of lasguns and laspistols this operative is equipped with.

equipments.name: ROSARY
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Rosary
ability.description: Once per battle, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of a shooting attack or combat, you can ignore the damage inflicted on this operative from one attack dice.

equipments.name: HAND AXE
equipments.description: The operative is equipped with the following melee weapon for the battle:

equipments.name: TRENCH SHOVEL
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Dug Trench
ability.description: While this operative is wholly within your drop zone, each time an enemy operative makes a shooting attack, if it is more than 2' from this operative, this operative is treated as being in Cover provided by Light terrain. This operative loses this ability if it performs a Normal Move, Charge, Fall Back or Dash action.

equipments.name: FRAG GRENADE
equipments.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Limited
specialRules.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRules.name: Blast 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Indirect
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

equipments.name: KRAK GRENADE
equipments.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle. It cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Limited
specialRules.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRules.name: Indirect
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

specialRules.name: AP1
specialRules.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

equipments.name: CHRONOMETER
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Chronometer
ability.description: Once per battle, after rolling off to determine initiative, this operative can use this ability. If it does, you can re-roll your dice.

equipments.name: TOPOGRAPHICAL CHART
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Topographical Chart
ability.description: During the mission sequence, if this friendly operative was selected for deployment, after resolving your selected option in the Scouting step, you can select and resolve an additional scouting option. It must be a different option to your original selection, and initiative is still determined by your original selection.

tacOps.name: BOOTS ON THE GROUND
tacOps.description: You can reveal this Tac Op at the end of any Turning Point.
tacOps.firstCondition: At the end of that Turning Point, if there are more friendly operatives than enemy operatives within 6' of your drop zone, and there more friendly operatives than enemy operatives within 6' of your opponent's drop zone, you score 1VP.
tacOps.secondCondition: If you achieve the first condition at the end of any subsequent Turning Points, you score 1VP.

tacOps.name: STAND FAST
tacOps.description: You can reveal this Tac Op in the Reveal Tac Ops step of any Turning Point.
tacOps.firstCondition: At the end of any Turning Point, if friendly operatives control two or more objective markers, and friendly operatives control more objective markers than enemy operatives do, you score 1 VP.
tacOps.secondCondition: If you achieve the first condition at the end of any subsequent Turning Points, you score an additional 1VP.

tacOps.name: GLORY IN DEATH
tacOps.description: Reveal this Tac Op at the end of the battle.
tacOps.firstCondition: If more friendly operatives were incapacitated than enemy operatives, but you scored more victory points from the mission objective, you score 2VPs.

abilityOfKillTeam.name: ANCILLARY SUPPORT
abilityOfKillTeam.description: Ancillary Support are operatives and tactical assets that supplement existing kill teams. The Ancillary Support options listed below can only be taken with VETERAN GUARDSMAN kill teams, and only as specified above.

ancillarySupport.name: TROOPER VETERANS
ancillarySupport.description: This Ancillary Support consists of 4 TROOPER VETERAN operatives.

ancillarySupport.name: VETERAN GUARDSMAN TACTICAL ASSETS
ancillarySupport.description: This Ancillary Support consists of 2 tactical assets. Tactical assets are not operatives, therefore are not recorded on your roster/dataslate. Each time you select this asset, select two options from the list below to use in the battle. You can select each option once.
ancillarySupport.postText: If you have any tactical assets that can be used, during the Firefight phase, when you would activate a Ready friendly operative, you can use one of your tactical assets instead. Select one of your tactical assets and resolve its effects. When doing so, treat that asset as a friendly operative. After you have done so, your opponent activates one of their operatives as normal. You can use no more than one tactical asset per Turning Point, and each tactical asset you have can be used once per battle.

tacticalAssets.name: Artillery Barrage
tacticalAssets.description: Perform a Shoot action using the ranged weapon below. For the purposes of Line of Sight, draw Visibility and Cover lines from a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative. Note for the purposes of this weapon's special rules, treat that friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative as performing the Shoot action.

Instead, if any part of the operative's base is hidden by a terrain feature from directly above, the defender can retain defence dice as if they were in cover.

X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast . An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Indirect
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

tacticalAssets.name: Marked Air Strike
tacticalAssets.description: Perform a Shoot action using the ranged weapon below. For the purposes of Line of Sight, draw Visibility and Cover lines from a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative. Note for the purposes of this weapon's special rules, treat that friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative as performing the Shoot action.

Instead, if any part of the operative's base is hidden by a terrain feature from directly above, the defender can retain defence dice as if they were in cover.

specialRules.name: Blast 2'

X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast . An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

tacticalAssets.name: Guided Missile
tacticalAssets.description: Perform a Shoot action using the ranged weapon below. For the purposes of Line of Sight, draw Visibility and Cover lines from a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative. Note for the purposes of this weapon's special rule, treat that friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative as performing the Shoot action.

specialRules.name: AP1
specialRules.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

tacticalAssets.name: Strafing Run
tacticalAssets.description: Select one enemy operative in a friendly VETERAN GUARDSMAN operative's Line of Sight to be the mark. Then place a Strafing Run token anywhere in the killzone (if you have a killzone edge, it cannot be placed closer to your edge than the mark is). Draw an imaginary line, 1 mm wide, with unlimited height above and below between any part of the base of the mark and the centre of that Strafing Run token. Using the ranged weapon below, make a shooting attack against the mark and each other operative that has a base crossed by that line. For those shooting attacks, when determining if an other operative is a valid target and if it is in Cover, draw Visibility and Cover lines from the mark, and if they are in Cover provided by Light terrain or another operative, they are treated as having an Engage order for that attack instead.

availableDataslates.name: GREY KNIGHT (WARRIOR)
availableDataslates.description: Grey Knights are martial elites clad in ward-etched armour. They combine the genetic augmentation of Space Marines with an indomitable psychic might, smiting those who traffic with the daemonic wherever they hide.

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

uniqueActions.name: Manifest Psychic Power
uniqueActions.description: Psychic action. Resolve a GREY KNIGHT psychic power.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRules.name: Relentless

The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

availableDataslates.name: GREY KNIGHT (GUNNER)
availableDataslates.description: It takes years of intensive training for a Grey Knight to master the psychically charged specialist weapons of their Chapter, but those who do are capable of unleashing barrages of esoteric firepower that rip through the heaviest of opposition.

specialRules.name: Heavy
specialRules.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Torrent 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action or Overwatch action and selects this weapon, after making the shooting attack against the target, it can make a shooting attack with this weapon against each other valid target within x of the original target and each other, x is the distance after the weapon's Torrent, e.g. Torrent 2'.

uniqueActions.name: Manifest Psychic Power
uniqueActions.description: Psychic action. Resolve a GREY KNIGHT psychic power.

specialRules.name: Heavy
specialRules.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

specialRules.name: Fusillade
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon, after selecting a valid target, you can select any number of other valid targets within 2' of the original target. Distribute your attack dice between the targets you have selected. Make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each of the targets you have selected using the attack dice you have distributed to each of them.

specialRules.name: Heavy
specialRules.description: An operative cannot perform a Charge, Fall Back or Normal Move action in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

availableDataslates.name: GREY KNIGHT JUSTICAR
availableDataslates.description: Justicars are the lynchpin of their team. In psychic communion, they lead their brothers in carefully divined tactical ploys, arcane battle rites and psychic rituals.

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, you can re-roll any or all of your attack dice.

ploys.name: BOLTER DISCIPLINE
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is activated, if it does not perform a Fight action during that activation, it can perform two Shoot actions during that activation if a storm bolter is selected for each of those shooting attacks.

ploys.name: SHOCK ASSAULT
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is activated, if it does not perform a Shoot action during that activation, it can perform two Fight actions during that activation.

ploys.name: TIDE OF SHADOWS
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time an enemy operative on a Vantage Point makes a shooting attack, each friendly GREY KNIGHT operative that has a Conceal order, is in Cover provided by Light terrain and is more than 6' from that enemy operative cannot be treated as being on an Engage order for that shooting attack as a result of that Vantage Point.

ploys.name: TIDE OF CELERITY
ploys.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative performs a Charge action, it can move an additional 1' for that action.

ploys.name: ONLY IN DEATH DOES DUTY END
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a ready friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is incapacitated. That operative is not removed from the killzone until the end of your next activation or the end of the battle (whichever comes first) and does not count as being injured.

ploys.name: AND THEY SHALL KNOW NO FEAR
ploys.description: Use this Tactical Ploy when a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative is activated. Until the end of that operative's activation, you can ignore any or all modifiers to its APL characteristic and it is not injured.

equipments.name: PSYBOLT AMMUNITION
equipments.description: Select one storm bolter the operative is equipped with. Add 1 to that weapon's Damage characteristics for the battle.

equipments.name: SANCTIC BLESSING
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Sanctic Blessing
ability.description: Once per battle, during this operative's activation, it can perform a free Manifest Psychic Power action.

equipments.name: HEXAGRAMMIC WARD
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Hexagrammic Ward
ability.description: Once per battle, when an enemy operative that is Visible to this operative performs a psychic action, this operative can use this ability. If it does so, roll one D6: on a 3+, that action's psychic power is not resolved (the action points subtracted for that action are not refunded).

equipments.name: TRUESILVER ARMOUR
equipments.description: This operative has a Save characteristic of 2+ for the battle.

equipments.name: PURITY SEAL
equipments.description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Purity Seal
ability.description: Once per battle, when this operative is fighting in combat, making a shooting attack or a shooting attack is being made against it, you can use the Command Re-roll Tactical Ploy without spending any CP.

equipments.name: PSYK-OUT GRENADE
equipments.description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

specialRules.name: Rng 6'
specialRules.description: Range. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, only operatives within x are a valid target, x is the distance after the weapon's Rng, e.g. Rng 6'. All other rules for selecting a valid target still apply.

specialRules.name: Limited
specialRules.description: This weapon can only be selected for use once per battle. If the weapon has a special rule that would allow it to make more than one shooting attack for an action (e.g. Blast), make each of those attacks as normal.

specialRules.name: Blast 2'
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative performs a Shoot action and selects this weapon (or, in the case of profiles, this weapon's profile), after making the shooting attack against the target, make a shooting attack with this weapon (using the same profile) against each other operative Visible to and within X of the original target - each of them is a valid target and cannot be in Cover. X is the distance after the weapon's Blast, e.g. Blast 2'. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action.

specialRules.name: Indirect
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the select valid target step of that shooting attack, enemy operatives are not in Cover.

specialRules.name: Psyk-out
specialRules.description: Each time a shooting attack is made with this weapon, if the target has the PSYKER or DAEMON keyword, for that shooting attack, change its Damage characteristics to 3/5 and it has the Lethal 5+ special rule.

psychicPowerDescriptions: Each time a friendly GREY KNIGHT operative performs the Manifest Psychic Power action, select one psychic power from the list below to be resolved.

psychicPowers.name: ARMOURED RESILIENCE
psychicPowers.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, improve this operative's Save characteristic by 1.

psychicPowers.name: HAMMERHAND
psychicPowers.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, each time this operative fights in combat, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat, the first time it strikes, inflict 1 additional damage on the target.

psychicPowers.name: ASTRAL AIM
psychicPowers.description: Until the end of the Turning Point, this operative's ranged weapons gain the No Cover special rule.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR COMMSMAN
availableDataslates.description: The Infiltrator Commsman acts as a strategic nexus upon the battlefield, a conduit through which vox-exchanges and intelligence inloads pass like lightning. The presence of such a battle-brother increases the strike team's versatility and swiftness of action.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

abilities.name: Omni-scrambler
abilities.description: Once in each Strategy phase, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, if any friendly operatives with this ability are in the killzone, you can use this ability instead. If you do so, select one enemy operative Visible to any friendly operative with this ability; in the following Firefight phase, that enemy operative is treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 1, and cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:
subText: A number of enemy operatives have been activated equal to the number of friendly operatives with this ability in the killzone at the start of the phase.
It is the last enemy operative to be activated.

uniqueActions.name: Guerrilla Warfare
uniqueActions.description: Change this operative's order. This operative cannot perform this action during the first Turning Point or while within 6' of an enemy operative.

uniqueActions.name: Comms Array
uniqueActions.description: Select one other friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operative Visible to this operative. That operative can immediately perform a free 1AP action; it cannot perform an action it has already performed during this Turning Point or an action in which it moves, and it cannot perform that action again during this Turning Point. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR HELIX ADEPT
availableDataslates.description: Operating as they do - far behind enemy lines without support - Phobos Strike Teams reguire the medicae support of Helix Adepts to get wounded battle-brothers back into the fight, and to reclaim the gene-seed of the slain for the Chapter.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

abilities.name: Omni-scrambler
abilities.description: Once in each Strategy phase, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, if any friendly operatives with this ability are in the killzone, you can use this ability instead. If you do so, select one enemy operative Visible to any friendly operative with this ability; in the following Firefight phase, that enemy operative is treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 1, and cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:
subText: A number of enemy operatives have been activated equal to the number of friendly operatives with this ability in the killzone at the start of the phase.
It is the last enemy operative to be activated.

abilities.name: Combat Restoratives
abilities.description: Once per Turning Point, the first time a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operative would be incapacitated while Visible to and within 3' of this operative and not within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, if this operative is not within Engagement Range of an enemy operative, this operative can revive it. That operative is not incapacitated, has D3 wounds remaining, and if it was a shooting attack, any remaining attack dice are discarded. That operative can then perform a free Dash action, but must finish that move within 1' of this operative. Subtract 1 from both operatives' APL.

uniqueActions.name: Guerrilla Warfare
uniqueActions.description: Change this operative's order. This operative cannot perform this action during the first Turning Point or while within 6' of an enemy operative.

uniqueActions.name: Helix Gauntlet
uniqueActions.description: Select one friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operative Visible to and within 1' of this operative. That operative regains 2D3 lost wounds. An operative cannot be selected for this action if it was revived using the Combat Restoratives ability during the same Turning Point. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR SABOTEUR
availableDataslates.description: Carrying a deadly array of melta charges, super-krak munitions and even anti-plant canisters into battle, the Infiltrator Saboteur is well prepared to rig any target for destruction. This task completed, they fall back swiftly before triggering a blast like the Emperor's wrath.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

specialRules.name: AP1
specialRules.description: Armour Penetration. Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, subtract x from the Defence of the target for that shooting attack, x is the number after the weapon's AP, e.g. AP1. If two different APx special rules would be in effect for a shooting attack, they are not cumulative - the attacker selects which one to use.

specialRules.name: Detonate
specialRules.description: If this operative performs a Shoot action with this weapon, make a shooting attack against each operative within 3' of the centre of its Saboteur Explosives token with this weapon. When making those shooting attacks, each operative is treated as being Visible, but when determining if it is in Cover, treat this operative's Saboteur Explosives token as the active operative. Then remove this operative's Saboteur Explosives token. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by performing an Overwatch action, or if its Saboteur Explosives token is not in the killzone.

specialRules.name: Silent
specialRules.description: While an operative has a Conceal order, it can perform Shoot actions if this is the ranged weapon (or weapon profile) that is selected for the shooting attack(s).

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your attack dice results of equal to or greater than x that are successful hits are critical hits, x is the number after the weapon's Lethal, e.g. Lethal 5+.

abilities.name: Omni-scrambler
abilities.description: Once in each Strategy phase, when it is your turn to use a Strategic Ploy or pass, if any friendly operatives with this ability are in the killzone, you can use this ability instead. If you do so, select one enemy operative Visible to any friendly operative with this ability; in the following Firefight phase, that enemy operative is treated as having a Group Activation characteristic of 1, and cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:
subText: A number of enemy operatives have been activated equal to the number of friendly operatives with this ability in the killzone at the start of the phase.
It is the last enemy operative to be activated.

uniqueActions.name: Guerrilla Warfare
uniqueActions.description: Change this operative's order. This operative cannot perform this action during the first Turning Point or while within 6' of an enemy operative.

uniqueActions.name: Plant Saboteur Explosives
uniqueActions.description: Place a Saboteur Explosives token within 1' of this operative. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative. If this operative is incapacitated and removed from the killzone, remove its Saboteur Explosives token. This operative can only perform this action once.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR VETERAN
availableDataslates.description: The most experienced Infiltrator battle-brothers stalk their enemies like armoured gheists, wielding weaponry selected from their Chapter's most rarefied armouries, each one augmented through the careful attentions of master artificers. So-armed, they can act as the nemeses of any foe.

specialRules.name: Custom
specialRules.description: If this operative is selected for deployment, select up to two of the following special rules or critical hit rules for this weapon to gain for the battle: Balanced, Lethal 5+, No Cover, MW1, P1, Rending.

specialRules.name: Custom
specialRules.description: If this operative is selected for deployment, select up to two of the following special rules or critical hit rules for this weapon to gain for the battle: Balanced, Lethal 5+, No Cover, MW1, P1, Rending.

uniqueActions.name: Guerrilla Warfare
uniqueActions.description: Change this operative's order. This operative cannot perform this action during the first Turning Point or while within 6' of an enemy operative.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR VOXBREAKER
availableDataslates.description: The Voxbreaker makes war in both the physical and dataspectral realms. Not only does their specialised equipment allow them to scan and isolate enemy threats, but they can also break into the foe's communications and plunder them for strategic intelligence.

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+

uniqueActions.name: Voxbreak
uniqueActions.description: While an enemy operative is within 6' of this operative, each time that enemy operative fights in combat or makes a shooting attack, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your opponent cannot re-roll their attack dice.

uniqueActions.name: Auspex Scan
uniqueActions.description: Select one enemy operative with a Conceal order within 6' of this operative, then select one friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAMS operative Visible to and within 3' of this operative. Until the end of the Turning Point, that friendly operative treats that enemy operative as if it has an Engage order. This operative cannot perform this action while within Engagement Range of an enemy operative.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR WARRIOR
availableDataslates.description: The Infiltrators who fight as part of Phobos Strike Teams are swift and aggressive in thought and deed, even by the standards of their warrior brotherhood. Few foes can long evade their pinpoint volleys or the bone-crushing blows of their armoured fists.

availableDataslates.name: INFILTRATOR SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Exemplar to their brothers; strategic and tactical leader of exceptional skill; deadly enemy to the Emperor's foes: the Infiltrator Sergeant must be all of these things, for it is by his words and actions that the Phobos Strike Team stands or falls.

availableDataslates.name: INCURSOR MARKSMAN
availableDataslates.description: As though the combination of a highly trained Space Marine and a potent mark of bolt carbine were not deadly enough, the Incursor Marksman employs his Divinator-class auspex to precognitively track where his targets will be, then places killing shots accordingly.

abilities.name: Multi-spectrum Array
abilities.description: When determining if an intended target is in this operative's Line of Sight:
subText: For the intended target to be Obscured, it must be more than 4' (instead of 2') from a point at which a Cover line crosses a terrain feature that is Obscuring.
Areas of smoke (e.g. smoke grenade) have no effect.

uniqueActions.name: Guerrilla Warfare
uniqueActions.description: Change this operative's order. This operative cannot perform this action during the first Turning Point or while within 6' of an enemy operative.

uniqueActions.name: Track Target
uniqueActions.description: Once this Turning Point during an enemy operative's activation, after that enemy operative performs an action, you can interrupt that activation. If you do so, this operative can perform an Overwatch action (if it has a Conceal order, change it to an Engage order to do so). It must make that shooting attack against that enemy operative using its stalker marksman bolt carbine (if it is a valid target). If that enemy operative is not incapacitated or revived as a result, finish its activation. This action is treated as a Shoot action with a bolt weapon for the purposes of action restrictions, although this operative can perform this action if it has a Conceal order.

availableDataslates.name: INCURSOR MINELAYER
availableDataslates.description: Some Incursors carry heavy haywire mines into battle, planting them at pre-cogitated nexuses of probable enemy movement. The electrophantasmic blasts of these weapons can banish machine spirits from enemy wargear and cripple augmetic enhancements.

specialRules.name: No Cover
specialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, for that shooting attack, defence dice cannot be automatically retained as a result of Cover (they must be rolled instead).

specialRules.name: Lethal 5+

specialRules.name: No Cover

specialRules.name: Proximity
specialRules.description: The first time an enemy operative moves within 3' of this operative's Haywire Mine token, make a shooting attack against that operative with this weapon (even if this operative is not in the killzone). When making that shooting attack, that enemy operative is always a valid target. Then remove this operative's Haywire Mine token. An operative cannot make a shooting attack with this weapon by any other means, or if its Haywire Mine token is not in the killzone.

criticalHitSpecialRules.name: Stun
criticalHitSpecialRules.description: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, if you retain any critical hits, subtract 1 from the target's APL. Each time a friendly operative fights in combat with this weapon, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of that combat:
subText: The first time you strike with a critical hit, select one of your opponent's normal hits from that combat to be discarded
The second time you strike with a critical hit, subtract 1 from the target's APL.

availableDataslates.name: INCURSOR WARRIOR
availableDataslates.description: Incursors are potent offensive skirmishers. They use oracular auspexes slaved to their occulus bolt carbines to spot enemy targets, even through solid walls. They then press swiftly upon their foes' positions before engaging in bloody, one-sided hrefights with the outmanoeuvred enemy.

availableDataslates.name: INCURSOR SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Tending towards aggressive and dynamic strategies, Incursor Sergeants lead Phobos Strike Teams in furious covert offensives that leave enemy command structures and logistical chains in tatters, ripe for planetary onslaught by a full-blown Space Marine strike force.

availableDataslates.name: REIVER WARRIOR
availableDataslates.description: Bursting from the shadows amidst vox-amplified howls, Reivers fall upon their horrified victims with pistols booming and blades swinging. As their foes reel from the disorienting blasts of their shock grenades, the Reivers make short and bloody work of their victims.

uniqueActions.name: Terror
uniqueActions.description: Until the end of the Turning Point:
subText: Each time an enemy operative would perform a mission action or the Pick Up action, if any friendly operatives that performed this action during this Turning Point are within 3' of that enemy operative, one additional action point must be subtracted for that enemy operative to perform that action.

When determining control of an objective marker that any friendly operatives that performed this action during this Turning Point are within range of, treat enemy operatives' total APL as being 1 less. Note that this is not a modifier.

availableDataslates.name: REIVER SERGEANT
availableDataslates.description: Reiver Sergeants are masters of psychological warfare and terror tactics. Their remit is to wield their Phobos Strike Team like a scalpel, slicing apart the tenuous strands of enemy morale until the foe's forces are reduced to a nerveless and broken tangle.
